channel.title: NICOLA'S Live Video Shows
channel.description:
NICOLA and the Band perform live and archived in case you could not make it to the show! Feel free to comment on our shows or anything else we publish. Remember you can catch the entire show on NICOLA's Audio Podcast here on Podomatic! Keep the podcast going by buying a CD in support. Rock on!
www.nicolanicola.com www.myspace.com/nicola www.nicolanicola.podomatic.com www.nicolanyc.podomatic.com www.youtube.com/nicolanicola www.cdbaby.com/nicolanyc4
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video podcast of Live Show Clips archived in case you missed it! Watch and enjoy! Remember you can catch the entire show on NICOLA's Audio Podcast here on Podomatic!
channel.itunes:author: Nicola

item.title: Nicola - "Ain't Nobody" Chaka Khan Cover - Live Acoustic
item.description: April 3, 2010 This video was recorded live of Nicola performing an acoustic version and her own twist on Chaka Khan's hit song "Ain't Nobody" at Starving Artist Cafe on City Island, Bx - NY. It was a sold out house with the audience singing and jamming! Nicola - vocals and guitar Ray "Chino" Diaz - percussion www.nicolanicola.com www.myspace.com/nicola www.facebook.com/nicolanyc www.twitter.com/nicolanicola www.youtube.com/nicolanicola www.reverbnation.com/nicolanicola www.starvingartistonline.com

item.title: Nicola - "My Name Ain't Mary"
item.description: Hey Guys, Wow! It's been a while! Happy New Year! Here's the latest Video from NYC Billboard Artist Nicola January 2010 "My Name Ain't Mary" Album: "Don't Take It Personally - Deluxe Edition" Hot Cherry Records copyright 2010 NicSongs (BMI) Video Credits: Director/Producer: Kiara Doerr Director of Photography: Clay Patrick McBride Album Credits: Nicola - Vocals, Guitar Eric Seiz - Guitar Jules Rosaly - Bass, Vocals Jimmy Wilgus - Keyboards, Programming and Drums Ray Diaz - Percussion Produced and mixed by Jimmy Wilgus at The Den - Whippany, NJ Links: www.nicolanicola.com www.myspace.com/nicola www.facebook.com/nicolanyc www.twitter.com/nicolanicola www.nicolanicola.podomatic.com www.nicolanyc.podomatic.com www.youtube.com/nicolanicola www.cdbaby.com/nicolanyc4

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Nicola - "(5,6,7,8) Hot Date"
